info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutherford and northeastern Polk Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Forest City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Bostic, Green Hill, Thermal City, Harris and Union Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
